thread.title: Obama: Iran's path to nuclear weapons will be cut off - CNN Video
thread.title_full: Obama: Iran's path to nuclear weapons will be cut off - CNN Video

title: Obama: Iran's path to nuclear weapons will be cut off - CNN Video
text:
Added on 1032 GMT (1732 HKT) July 14, 2015 President Obama speaks about the landmark deal aimed at reining in Iran's nuclear program.
Landmark deal reached on Iran nuclear program By Jethro Mullen and Nic Robertson, CNN After tortuous talks that spanned 20 months, negotiators have reached a landmark deal aimed at reining in Iran's nuclear program.
More from US
